text: Guys...

Felix is a great guy,
he's not an antisemite.
And...

that Felix was dropped from his network,
that YouTube cancelled his show.
He's being denounced - there's like 20 articles
calling him a raging anti-Semite.
I feel like, as a Jew, and as somebody who knows Felix and is friends with him,
I'm in a unique position to talk about this situation.
So as far as I can tell, this new round of hit-jobs on Felix, started from the Wall Street Journal.
With an article entitled "Disney Severs Ties With YouTube Star PewDiePie After Anti-Semitic Posts."
Okay that title is fucking garbage, anti-Semitic posts!?
Let's just show what he did.
"But anyway! Fiverr now has decided that -- that this kind of work is not enough, they need more.

PewDiePie went on Fiverr,
and as a joke, he asked people to hold up a sign that says, "Death to all Jews."
COMMA!

"Death to all Jews COMMA, subscribe to Keemstar."

Okay?

and you're making me explain a fucking joke,
which is always obscene,

It's an interesting commentary.
He found a guy who impersonates Jesus
and got him to say, "Hitler did absolutely nothing wrong."
"Hello!
Jesus here.

Now that is fucking hilarious guys,
Okay,
it's a JOOOOOKKKKEEEEE!
He's not serious!
There's a big difference, guys, context matters!

and this is the the problem with this manufactured outrage :
people getting offended for people who are not offended.
You don't need to get outraged on my behalf.
Okay?

Context matters.
Use your fucking brain, guys.

Don't you talk about like...
Wall Street?
And now you're writing about PewDiePie?
Is -- business must be slow, eh guys?

for absolutely no reason.
Wall Street Journal, you guys have a stellar,
STELLAR reputation. You are the best, man.

let's go to their YouTube channel,

*the steel drums grow stronger, emphasizing that the evil is everywhere*
Ooh!
I love this spooky music,
very scandalous!
Like a little tribal...
Ooh! I like that music!

*Hitler says some psychotic shit in German with C&C Red Alert's Hell March playing in the background*

where he lampoons the media for mischaracterizing him as racist.
"This is what people would actually think, if I didn't have a chance, to, you know...
'cuz people just read the title.
People just read this and they're like "Oh, ok,
I see,
PewDiePie's a Nazi now. That's...
Alright.'"
He puts on the imagery, and he watches a Hitler speech, as a joke,
making fun of himself, and the media, who mischaracterizes him.
And of course, they took it out of context to show that he's antisemitic.
It's fucking absurd.

and who wrote these articles,
looked at all of his videos, saw that he was talking about how the media misrepresents him,
ignored that, made the conscious decision to cut out the pieces they wanted,
TO MISREPRESENT HIM, AGAIN!
Shame on you, dude.
That is fucking pathetic.
I mean, I'm disappointed because it just proves, to these cult of outrage people,
that you can achieve whatever your outrage sets its will on.
You know what I mean, you can get PewDiePie's show canceled.
All I need to do is write into these fucking horseshit papers, and get a sensational title.
And it breaks my heart that YouTube, and Maker, and Disney caved to this fake outrage.

that Walt Disney was a notorious racist, and antisemite.
OK? So why don't you just close up shop?
Why don't you just shut down the whole fucking company?

Who's just a comedian, who didn't even make jokes that bad.
As a result of this manufactured outrage,
his network, Maker, which is owned by Disney,
and YouTube dropped his new, um, season of "Scare PewDiePie,"

to write an article about how Disney and YouTube are antisemitic.

that is, you know, been thrust onto Felix.
Even my parents; the fact that they read about this.
Friends are like "Hey what's up with PewDiePie, is he an antisemite?"
'Cause they know I'm friends with him.
*inhaling*
Um,
that is the biggest consequence of this, I think.
A GLOBAL case of defamation.
The -- the hardest irony to swallow,
is that these people are actually doing what they are accusing Felix of doing.
They are trivializing real racism,
by going on this campaign to accuse him of being a racist.
They are trivializing people who actually hate Jews.
Who actually hate black people.
Felix is not a real racist.
He's a comedian.
Maybe he pushed the boundary a little too far.
But guys, that's it.
Let's not call him an antisemite, because he's not.
Save your fucking outrage for the real racists.
And that's why I stand with PewDiePie,
and so should you.
